jd: From: Karthik, Softcom Systems karthik@softcomsystems.com Reply to: karthik@softcomsystems.com Hi Hope you are having a great day! This is Karthik from Softcom Systems. We have an immediate requirement for .NET Senior Developer/Lead role Newark, NJ( Hybrid Position) opportunity with one of our clients.Note: Need only local candidates in NJ and 14+ Years of expereince in .NET Kindly let me know your interest .NET Senior Developer/LeadNewark, NJHybrid (3 days onsite) Interview Process:Initial Phone/Video interviews followed by an in person interview. JD: QualificationsBS degree in Computer Science, a related technical field, or equivalent practical experience required12+ years of current experience in Software DevelopmentExperience with one or more object-oriented programming language, e.g. C#, .NET Core, SQL, etc.Knowledge of database systems including Oracle and SQL ServerStrong PL\SQL or stored procedure experienceStrong analytical skills, including a thorough understanding of how to interpret business needs and translate them into application requirementsExcellent verbal and written communication skills to effectively and confidently communicate with users, team members, and managementAbility to develop effective internal/external working relationships with both business units and vendors Familiarity with Microsoft Fabric Experience with the following would be a plus:Microsoft Fabric experience is plusApplication Lifecycle Management techniques and conceptsExperience with investments or securitiesAbility to work with Agile methodologies in a fast paced environmentExperience with one or more object-oriented programming language C#Test Driven Development, Entity Framework, MVCTFS/Bit bucket source control toolAutosys job management experienceJIRA experience for Agile ProjectsContinuous Integration Continuous Delivery (CICD) tools such as Jenkins and automated processesAPI management software like Apigee or equivalent
